website_summaries.verdict: A well-made, 12-piece set that is a fraction of the price of others we reviewed – the best deal T-fal has to offer.
pros: Provides similar features as costlier models at a budget price – safe, PFOA-free nonstick surfaces, tempered glass lids, and solid aluminum design
cons: Consumers found that the surfaces scratch easily, but this is mostly avoidable by using nylon utensils when cooking

customer_reviews.title: Non-stick peeling off.
customer_reviews.text: This set is low quality. I've only used the five quart stock pot three times, and the non-stick coating is already bubbling and peeling off. I've made soup in it a few times on an induction cook top. It has been used to simmer soup for a couple hours three times, and that's it. It has only been hand washed. Do not buy this low quality junk. I attached a picture of the stock pot peeling. I bought this set in August 2018, and it's only December 25, 2018.
customer_reviews.author: Truenorth

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cookware
customer_reviews.text: My early thoughts on this set were positive. However, after 10 months of use, I am disappointed. The non-stick coating has worn off the skillet and the small saucepan. The coating is now wearing off the egg skillet as well. I did a great deal of homework before settling on this set. Unfortunately, it did not hold up to normal wear.
customer_reviews.author: gnlmiami

customer_reviews.title: Doll House Fry Pan Useless. Beware of marketing images.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because the set was fairly well reviewed and it was labled as “Amazon Choice”. I had never been disspointed in an Amazon Choice product until now. The small fry pan is useless. It is so small, I cannot imagine using it for anything. I am convinced it was only included in this set to offset the scale of the other pots and pans in marketing pictures. All are much smaller than represented.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck NYC

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty satisfied at first, the set looked good. However, by November 2018, the bottom of the frying pan is totally unrecognizable! Impossible to clean, I tried putting it in my Bosch dishwasher- no results, I tried cleaning it by hand, using non abrasive products of ALL kinds- no results! This set is of such poor quality that I am just going to throw it away-something I never do! Only the saucepans are decent. Mind you, what can you expect from a set of 12 pieces for 70 bucks?
customer_reviews.author: Sophie 68

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT non-stick
customer_reviews.text: I like Tfal products and I got this set specifically for a non-stick and dishwasher safe cookware. Well, I've only used it a couple of times so far and it is definitely NOT non-stick. Unfortunately I waited to long and missed my return window. I like these pots/pans and a set and still use them, but I really wish they were non-stick. I am now looking for an actually non-stick set and will probably donate these.
customer_reviews.author: dooni

customer_reviews.title: Deformed cookware, etc.
customer_reviews.text: I received my cookware today and was truly disappointed. I received two pans that were damaged, one pan is so damaged that the shape is deformed to the point the lid doesn't fit correctly and it's also missing a handle which broke into a million pieces. The other pan is also deformed and doesn't lay flat. It also looks like the box was damaged but put into another box to hide it before shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Fife

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware - NOT True Induction Cookware
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware!! This product can ruin your induction cooktop. While these pans are “induction cookware”, they do not have smooth bottoms. A true induction cooking pan needs to cover 70% or more of the burner. These pans do NOT!! We just had to replace our main heating element on our brand new cooktop. DO NOT BUY!!! This cook set will end up costing you up to $1000 in cooktop repairs costs!!!!
customer_reviews.author: SKH

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these pots about a month ago when I moved into my new apartment. After finally getting moved in completely, I've now used them twice and the bottom of each of the pans and pots have white spots all over them after washing in dawn and water (looks as if the bottom got sand with sandpaper!). Horrible! I am entirely disappointed! This is the worst purchase and I've never had an issue with TFAL pots, these are probably the knockoff brands on Amazon, if not I probably got a poor set! I wish I did not spend my money on this! Update: washed them again and no change! Here’s the pic! #pissed!
customer_reviews.author: C Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for RV - Love that is stackable and takes up less space
customer_reviews.text: I really like how this cookware was stackable and multifunctional. I needed something for our RV that would be useful for all my cooking needs and be able to store away with limited space. This set was perfect for all my cooking needs. My friends like how the look and the different types pots/pans that came in cookware set. They make great gifts for housewarming, weddings too.
customer_reviews.author: Mr & Mrs Shrum

customer_reviews.title: VERY disappointed with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, I bought a set. It says DW safe which is important to me. When I wash it with powder or liquid DW detergent, there are always white spots and residue on the back of the pots! The outer layer is starting to crack and peel. NOT a very good quality set. I hope the manufacturer or importer will send me a new set after reading this or refund me my money!!! I wanted to love this set, BUT am not and will not recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: BHL

customer_reviews.title: Not induction compatible
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set as T-fal has been a reputable brand for several decades. I also trust an item that is Prime worthy. In this instance I was wrong in both cases. I placed a quart of water in a pan and placed it on my induction cooktop. I turned the burner to Powerboil. Usually within 90 - 120 seconds the water in my old pans was at a rapid boil. In this new T -fal pan after 10 minutes the water was barely warm. The pan was not compatible and receiving the heat from the cooktop as it should have been. So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kizere

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed 😞
customer_reviews.text: So everything else is working great. Although my Griddle lost its shape only after one use. First time I used it was laying flat on my stove top but after one use it's not flat anymore. Since it does not lay flat I can't use it anymore due to uneven heat distribution. Disappointed... I actually bought this set because griddle was included. Hope you can see it in my video.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for small kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set as a gift for my daughter, who was storing her pans in the oven for lack of any better space. I’m not a huge fan of oven storage since ovens are often turned on forgetting there is something inside. This stackable set was just what she needed for her small kitchen. I also purchased some silicon utensils to lengthen the life of the pans and advised her to only hand wash. She told me again recently how very much she’s enjoying these pans!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: No fryer lids
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. These are wonderful pans, cook well and are super easy to clean, but they don't come with lids for the frying pans. Most pan sets have interchangeable lids between the pots and the pans, but not this set. I contacted the company and was told they don't even make lids for the fryers, so you would "have to purchase universal lids" to solve the problem. How can you fry food without a lid? Never had this happen with any other sets I've ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: P. Btica

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this ZERO stars, I would. I have had this set for not even one month. Today, I was boiling lentils and using a rubber spatula to stir. I noticed these black flakes floating to the top of the pan and was really confused. I transferred the lentils to another pot and used a mini strainer to drain out some lentils, and there they were again - black flakes. The bottom of the pot now looks rusted. I want to be reimbursed for my order.
customer_reviews.author: Marielena Diaz

customer_reviews.title: NOT for induction cooktops FALSE ADVERTISING
customer_reviews.text: False advertising. We purchased these specifically for our induction cooktop. These are advertised for induction stoves and as Amazon’s choice. We received error messages from our cooktop when the pan is placed. These are not compatible with our kitchenaid cooktop. Also, why include an egg pan that is listed as not compatible with induction (at least that part is clearly written in the description) with an induction set as most people will buy the set specifically for these kinds of cooktops? These need to be relabeled and they won’t be such a disappointment. Now I need to search for pans that I can actually use. Waste of time unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Johuam

customer_reviews.title: "Spot heat indicator" does not work & coating peels off
customer_reviews.text: Update: My pans are now “bubbling” and the coating is peeling off. Totally disappointed with this purchase. I've waited and waited and waited for the "spot heat indicator" to work on any of these pots or pans and I've had them for months now. I have never seen it work. Additionally, its a bit misleading in description as one of the pans is for cooking like 1 egg.. I thought there would be a larger pan included. Maybe i didn't look closely enough? I like that they're dishwasher safe, and they clean well, but already have scratches on them and again the heat indicator is not a thing on these pans.
customer_reviews.author: stacia cross

customer_reviews.title: Not so great for Induction Cook Top!
customer_reviews.text: Nice pan set, but not very compatible with an induction cook top. Yes, it works on induction cook tops, but not as well as an other set that I bought from another company. For example, it takes 3-5 minutes to boil water in the large pot. It takes about 1 minute to boil the same amount of water in the similar sized pot from the other company. I've always loved T-fal in the past. These pots and pans are nice, but the don't work well on an induction cook top.
customer_reviews.author: grahamel

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set in 2016. Today I am putting them in the trash. In slightly over two years, all of the pans exterior bottoms have literally chipped off in chunks. Now you need to understand that we are a family of two. I do not cook for an army of people. I have never had a set of pots do this. It looked like someone chiseled out the areas around the hot spot. I am not talking a scratch, either. This is the last t-fal product I will buy. Very sad.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry

customer_reviews.title: Great, good, bad, and  then ugly
customer_reviews.text: P:urchased in November,2017; great service, great look and then, forget my good, things turned bad after several times per week use and careful care; pots show ugly scratches and am now very disappointed with what initially appeared outstanding. I admit I am a little picky and so....appearance and service has gone from a 9 to a 2 on a scale of 1 to 10 with 10 being excellent. I wonder how many others have had similar experience.
customer_reviews.author: Jack C. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality, cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Have only had this set for a little over a month and they are already showing signs of wear on the bottom when I have been very careful with them. Not impressed and won’t be buying this set or possibly this brand again. They clean up well and heat fast but that is it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Miller

customer_reviews.title: very pleased
customer_reviews.text: i down sized my kitchen and passed on my larger cookware to others that have the need for larger meals etc..[meaning i am off the hook for Thanksgiving and Christmas lol ] this set is really all i need and i like the fact that it is space saving and stackable ..even the lids have the nice feature.and it includes the plastic lids that allow you to store in the fridge in the pot, great feature. the clean up is easy . the larger skillet is perfect for saute and the second skillet is deep and useable as a saucepan..overall this is a nice set . i am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: bookworm 2

customer_reviews.title: Great job T - Fal
customer_reviews.text: I used T - Fal in the 80's. They were cutting edge for a learner. LOL. This new set of induction pan by T - Fal are no different for intro pans to induction. With experience I may hold that cutting edge thought as truth. Thank God I can cook and truly utilize the energy saving of induction with the control of a gas stove. These pans are a great value and better than advertized. I wish T-Fal continued growth and success. These seem to be the real deal for induction
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Make it tighter
customer_reviews.text: I like the pots and pans but the handle came off while I was making my soup . handle not that strong 😬
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing pans for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I waited for 6 months to review the pans to have some experience with using them. They came just as described. I was pleased that the lids fit pans and skillets. Very nice! I like the heat indicator marks in the center circle. Works great by changing color from darker dots to solid red. Very easy to clean. I use 3 or 4 daily and they are holding up like brand new. Yes I would buy again and likely will buy another set for my summer house
customer_reviews.author: keithmichal

customer_reviews.title: Cheap cheap
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cookware in 2016 the outside finish is chipping off they look so bad I'm embarrassed for anyone to see. I also notice the inside is showing wear also. They where so pretty when I first got then now I need to put in trash. I don't cook a lot so this cookware should have lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Diana S. Potter

customer_reviews.title: TFAL not what it used to be
customer_reviews.text: Name brand? Not anymore. I have had these pans 3 months and the non stick has already came off. Avoid this brand. Zero stars if i could.
customer_reviews.author: Family Man

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far things are going okay with this set. I've had them for about a month now, and no issues really. I can't say that I'm a huge fan of the heat distribution on the bigger pans, but I also can't say for sure if that's pans, the stove, or a combination of the two. What is beyond stupid to me is that in a set that is for an induction stove they include a pan that cannot actually be used on an induction stove. SO STUPID!
customer_reviews.author: Pandora2288

customer_reviews.title: Stacks well
customer_reviews.text: I love that these stack so well. I will be moving into an rv soon, but these would have been great in my last apartments as well. They are better quality nonstick coating than the pans I have purchased previously and heat distribution seems similar to what I expected. A heavier pan would be better, but I like my pans light, so if I wanted better distribution, I would put a heat diffuser underneath, so I could still move the pots freely. I wasn't sure about the lid handles, but they work surprisingly well and the pots and pans stack nicely. I have only had these for a month or two, so I can't comment on how they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: B+ > One pot was defected
customer_reviews.text: Big fan of this line of pots & pans. Only gave 4 stars because after using each pan only "once", 1 of the pots showed wear & scratches. I was shocked, especially because I only used the spatula that came with the set. I think this 1 pot is defected. The rest of the set is perfectly fine. Non-stick and very easy to wipe clean.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold up over time
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the set of T-Fal C530SC since August 2018. The price has dropped from $69.99 to $42.49 in under than 5 months of purchase (July 27). I hand wash the set but still noticed that non-stick coating is wearing off. The handles conduct heat fast, I have to use oven mits or dish towel when taking it any pot off the stove top. I would not recommend this set to family or friends.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Great set of induction pots & pans, except for that One Egg Wonder pan.
customer_reviews.text: Why go to the trouble of putting together a great set of pots & pans that can be used on an induction stove, and include a One Egg Wonder pan that cannot? I'm sure T-fal has a version of this pan that is compatible with an induction stove. All of the other pots, fry pans, etc. work great. 5-stars for the rest of the "Professional Nonstick Cookware". And if you need cookware for an induction stove, these are what you need. But T-fal, you dropped the ball by including this unusable One Egg Wonder pan.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Not all of it was induction stove top useable
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this combo as it was listed as working with my induction stovetop... the smallest sauce pan did not work so I took it to my neighbor's house where it didn't work on his 4 induction burners. He has the same size pan which did work on my stove... The sender sent me an entire new 8 piece combo, I took the little sauce pan out but the new one doesn't work either. I'll send back the new combo in the morning and just use the original sauce pan on the bbq and buy the same one my neighbor has.....The rest of the combo works great and we are happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Charles B. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Small "induction" pan
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set and have been VERY pleased except for the smallest fry pan. I used it today for the first time to make an egg for breakfast and it would not heat on my induction stove top. I placed a magnet on the bottom, to see if it would stick, and it did not. (This is a way to check to see if it is truly an induction pan.) Very disappointing as all the other pans work well. Hate to return all pans just for this little pan, but it appears this is a flaw in this set.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Flanagan

customer_reviews.title: Worked...kind of
customer_reviews.text: Just received the item and found that it barely works on my new induction cooktop. I have cheaper set of pots that work infinitely better than this set did. Returning. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JLM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size set for RV lifestyle! With an induction cooktop, the selections can be few and far between! Upon further testing, the one egg wonder and the small sauce pan DO NOT work on our induction cooktop. The footprint is to small to activate the burner. We are searching for a induction flat pan to use underneath to activate the burner. Will update after we come up with an alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Guay

customer_reviews.title: T-fal non stick pans
customer_reviews.text: This set has a lot in it. There are pots and pans of different sizes with lids. It also includes a small spatula, which is now my favorite to use. The set is non-stick and food just slides off the pan. It is also very easy to clean. I have a glass slide-in stove and the pans are flat on the bottom and heat is distributed very evenly
customer_reviews.author: Flower

customer_reviews.title: DEFINITELY NOT FOR FAMILIES.
customer_reviews.text: While these are a very nice set of pots and lids, keep in mind that they are VERY small in size. The smallest fry pan is intended to make 1 fried egg. The large fry pan will make one large 8-10" pancake nicely. This set is great for a single person or a young couple who only occasionally cooks for 2 or less. The non-stick surface is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: markspike

customer_reviews.title: T-fal or not T-fal
customer_reviews.text: T-fal is taking my cooking to next level. I am so happy with this set. I love how the bottoms of the pans don't get all gross due to the interesting design which creates an even tempered heat throughout. I love how quickly and easily they clean up afterwards and I love the griddle pan. Size wise I might have made the skillets a little larger but that is not a real issue as we are only two people and for us the proportions fit well. Cooking is a joy with T-fal.
customer_reviews.author: anniemc

customer_reviews.title: T-fal quality
customer_reviews.text: The first cookware set I ever got was a t-fal one from my mom when I moved out of the house. That was in 1968. I a still using parts of it and the non stick surface is still there. So I naturally got t-fal when I ordered a new set as over time and countless moves I have lost several pieces. Easy to unpack and well packed the t-fal quality is still there. Only used the frying pan so far but it was great.
customer_reviews.author: Bigman9605

customer_reviews.title: Not great for glass top
customer_reviews.text: I bought a single tfal pan from another store and loved it so I decided to buy a set. This set is not like the single pan. My single pan has a smooth bottom while this set has super rough bottom. If you are using a glass top, this is NOT the set for you. These pans just scratched my brand new stove.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear

customer_reviews.title: After washing has a bad odor
customer_reviews.text: We bought this set for our RV. They worked great until about a 1/2 dozen washes. Now the pots have an unpleasant odor. We have washed and soaked a few times but we can't get the smell to go away. I was unable to locate the contact information for the seller to resolve this issue.
customer_reviews.author: SportsMom

customer_reviews.title: item discription is wrong
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed when I open the box. Almost all items are smaller than their description on their web site. It was 12 inch fry pan, 11inche deep saute, 1.5qt saucepan, 3qt saucepan 5qt Dutch oven on their description. But I got 12inch fry pan, 10inch deep saute, 1.1qt saucepan, 2.3qt saucepan, 4.2qt Dutch oven. I really like their design and quality, but it's too smaller than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: lily

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Teflon starting pealing on the OUTSIDE of the pans within 5 or 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: BDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Not a good non stick pan
customer_reviews.text: The non stick layer wears off in one month and they do not have a support staff to contact to for warranty details. Its a manageable product if you want to use it occasionally .
customer_reviews.author: Kunal P.

customer_reviews.title: I would have love the sautee pans to be larger
customer_reviews.text: That egg thing is a joke!! LMOL Otherwise, I would have love the sautee pans to be larger. Good for one (me), but not large enough for fridos leftovers. Quality seems good. Lack of lids on frying pans. I am keeping it thou. But I did order other individual pieces to complete the set. Larger pots!!!! Not recomended for a large family. Pots won't feed 4-5 peple. But I love them. Nice weight, going to oil them as per instructions and season them. I will report on use and abuse. I love to cook, was a Chef wy back. Calphalon is my other brand.
customer_reviews.author: hawaiiano

customer_reviews.title: Best go to Walmart instead
customer_reviews.text: Non - Stick my Butt. Sturdy? NOT. 70% of pots & pans have chips on interior surfaces and I don't even metal utensils!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan ACADguru

customer_reviews.title: BEST PANS
customer_reviews.text: I use this set ALL the time. The large fry pan and two saucepans most often. They are all fantastic. Nonstick, cleanup is so easy after cooking. The only thing I've had to get used to is these pans heat up more quickly and cook things more quickly than my old pans. Honestly has cut my cooking time in half which I LOVE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still give a nice sear on everything
customer_reviews.text: Really nonstick! My only gripe is that these seem to heat up slowly for me, but I'm also used to my (very much not non-stick) pans with copper filled bases. Still give a nice sear on everything, and makes cleaning up much easier. I haven't had any issues with scraping, so I wonder if the people who are having that issue are using incorrect spatulas/etc with these pans.
customer_reviews.author: MariaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Huge fan, terrific price
customer_reviews.text: really love these pots and pans especially fat that the handles do not get hot like a previous set that I ordered on Amazon. Love the space saving factor that the lids are interchangeable. The fact that the food just comes right out afterwards is a huge bonus and they seem to be lightweight
customer_reviews.author: Momma Mia

customer_reviews.title: Not for induction
customer_reviews.text: Not for induction! I am so disappointed in t-Fal. I have use their products on my induction cooktop for years. I needed new nonstick skillets, And of course ordered new T-Fal. Only the very large skillet works on the correct size burner. The smaller skillets have such a small burn area that they only work on my smallest burners and therefore only heat the very center of the skillet. So a grilled cheese only gets cooked in the very center of the sandwich and not the outer edges. Do not buy these skillets.They barely work on an induction top.
customer_reviews.author: SCOTT D FLETCHER

customer_reviews.title: Good induction cooking set
customer_reviews.text: I decided to go with all induction cooking set, and this did not disappoint. I like all the pan options this set provides. The one thing I had to get used to was how quickly things cook on this set and with the induction cookers. Be careful or you'll end up burning things. Also go right in the dishwasher and food doesn't stick at all.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: t-fal review
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set hoping to be the same as previous pieces I own but was not happy to see the lids do not fit correctly on all the pots intended. in my opinion I feel quality has slipped a tad. the induction bottom reacts differently on my induction burners causing heat differences?
customer_reviews.author: ken g

customer_reviews.title: Uneven heat distribution
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to see my new Tfal pots and pan set. So the first time I used the griddle pan,(square one), I started cooking something simple, bacon. Well it only cooked the bacon in the center of the pan, the ends of the bacon were still uncooked! Bottom line.... cooked MAJOR uneven! I was bummer beings I just purchased this set!
customer_reviews.author: Yulianna

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: I have been shopping for a new set of pots and pans for a few months - t-Fal has always been a mainstay in our household due to their quality and affordability - I found this set and am satisfied with every aspect!
customer_reviews.author: Blinn

customer_reviews.title: Uneven heat distribution & warped pans
customer_reviews.text: I never realized how big of an issue the heat distribution on these pans was until I recently purchased a new mid-sized pan. In about 6 months of moderate use, the larger pans have started to warp from the middle and it’s gotten to a point where you can’t evenly cook eggs or anything of that nature. If you want a long lasting set, you may need to look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Tarik A.

customer_reviews.title: Pans already falling apart
customer_reviews.text: Just started using my new pans in December. I only use the plastic cook wear on my pans and the Teflon is already scratching off. I'm super disappointed only used a month.
customer_reviews.author: Justin baker

customer_reviews.title: Good pans for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Overall very happy with these. Nice shape and weight with good handles and glass lids. I have an induction cook top so these are perfect - except the really small “bonus” pan, which would be perfect for individual fried eggs for example, is not suitable for induction, so I can’t use it. Overall though, very good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Neenah

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The egg pan is not induction!!! I thought there was something wrong with my first order so I ordered another set and the same issue. The smallest egg cookware that comes with the set is not induction. The distribution of oil on the pans pools on the periphery of the pan so the food gets stuck in the middle. Not worth the price for sure
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The reviews seem to be people either love it or hate it. I love the flat square pan thing, it's great and holds four peices of French toast or 4 grilled cheese. The temperature dots in the center DO change, the start to disappear, I kinda like it because I wait till the dots fade before cooking. So far so good, used them daily since before Christmas. No problems yet.
customer_reviews.author: Roy McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE......Big hole in package.
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived on timme.actually earlier than I thought.but was damaged.big hole in box and was taped up.havent opened yet to see if everything is there or any damage.will update. Open wet box bare handed,lol,everything was ther,intact.wish i could figure out hot to post a pic of the box but its all good.Tonight,tues night after work i washed them all and looks very good so far.Gave 4 star cause have not used them yet..
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Not matching lids
customer_reviews.text: Did not receive a third tool, got some other random plastic lid. The lids don't fit the pans, which would have been any sensible design option. Kind of felt it stupid on the sellers end to not provide a set where I could use the lids for both the pans and pots. Material is good otherwise
customer_reviews.author: ciryam

customer_reviews.title: T-FAL IS NOT A GOOD. THE NON-STICK PEELS OFF AFTER TWO MONTHS OF ...
customer_reviews.text: T-FAL IS NOT A GOOD. THE NON-STICK PEELS OFF AFTER TWO MONTHS OF USE WITH USING THE COOKING WEAR ITS NOT GOOD
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: It was awesome. -Excelente producto
customer_reviews.text: Follow the instructions before you use it. I made Beans from can already smashed/ Frijoles Refritos de lata. After that I made Eggs look the picures. and then fries chicken / Pechuga de pollo frito. It was awesome. -Excelente producto, Sorry about my english, look alll the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: TheCowboy

customer_reviews.title: Worth it at twice the cost
customer_reviews.text: I just had to rid of my old non-stick set. Nit a bad set, just old. These are great! Heavier than my last ones. I don't see the bottoms warping. Hate that. Heat evenly. I love it. The lid handles seem to be riveted. I hate to tighten handles when use wears the plastic washer out. I am very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Nina F.

customer_reviews.title: I knew i would be back
customer_reviews.text: it is 2020 and loss 69.$ on junk...again .. Going to company .Is it REALLY necessary to replace the complete set EVERY YR OR 2 OMG . You would not believe . I wipe it black comes off and off and continues.. there is no stopping this
customer_reviews.author: Sablelulu

customer_reviews.title: This set offers nice variety and is great for a starter kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this 3 years ago for my first apartment. I still use all of these pots and pans today! I can definitely notice a little bit of wear & tear, but that is typical for any product long-term. This set offers nice variety and is great for a starter kitchen. I hung mine up on a pot rack to save space. They rinse off nice and easy (I hand-wash all my dishes) and never had an issue cooking anything. Love em!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Great cookware
customer_reviews.text: Love this cookware. The quality is great for the price and the hotspot function is a cool or i should say, hot addition. They are easy to clean and surprisingly, the non stick surface for me is still working and I have owned them for a year at the time of the review. T-FAL has officially moved up to some of my favorite cookware on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Black

customer_reviews.title: Convenient set of Pans be careful on use
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set I buy, the first one was ok, after 4 years I noticed it started to peel and bend, I think it was due to bad use since this is the first time I have my own home. I washed them meanwhile them were hot and used a kind of soft sponge is not supposed to be used (green). After learning about PFOA and other chemical used on pans I decided to change the set. Hope this one last more years. The sizes of the pans and the number are perfect for daily cooking.
customer_reviews.author: FRANCISCO QUEVEDO

customer_reviews.title: Post peeling on the bottom!
customer_reviews.text: I've had T-fal pots & pans before, in fact I use one that I've had 26 years. I went and bought this set because of having some for so long & my new set, the paint is peeling on the bottom of all the items. I will not buy these again! They didn't even last a year & I went back to using my old set.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda K. Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Broke Lid but Good Set
customer_reviews.text: Ledt 3 stars for the broken lid piece. It may be a bit harsh, but I am not returning it and waiting for it for a small broke piece. Anyway, the set doesn't stick and cooks very well, I'd definitely recommend this product. I would suggest better handl9ng at the warehouse though.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: It has been almost a year now and this set has held up beautifully with heavy usage. We put it in the dishwasher almost every time it's used. It's easily become one of my favorite sets!
customer_reviews.author: AnnieRundle1222

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent set. Use these almost every day (except for the flat griddle). The only minus so far has been the big pan lid. The handle broke off and I had to get a replacement at a dollar store. The coating has held up so far on all of the items after a half year of moderate use. Would highly recommend this set to others.
customer_reviews.author: YevgeniyIgorovich

customer_reviews.title: Don’t use metal utinsils as this set claims you can.
customer_reviews.text: I specifically bought this set so that I could use metal utensils and not have to worry about scratching the surface of the pot/pan. That is the only reason I bought this set. The instructions say not to use anything with a sharp edge with the set. I used a metal spoon the other day to stir a sauce and the bottom of the pan is now completely scratched. I’m now outside of the return window for Amazon and will have to make a warranty claim in which I’m sure I’m going to have to fight to prove that this product did not perform as intended or advertised. Boooooooooooooooooooooooooo
customer_reviews.author: David Johns

customer_reviews.title: We love these pots and pans
customer_reviews.text: The only reason they get 4 stars out of five is that the lids creek and pop when they get heated up like they are going to break but I've heated the lid then used a bit of water to create steam. I think it's the metal expanding around the glass. It just gives me the creeps.
customer_reviews.author: Gary P.

customer_reviews.title: Not as Nonstick as should be
customer_reviews.text: They're OK... but the nonstick is definitely subpar. Stuff sticks! The fancy "copper" and "heat indicator" features... just paint. That said, they work as cooking utensils, and they're better than the crappy old ones they replaced. Will order better next time, if there is a next time.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great price, easy to clean, have held up.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this set. It’s affordable and then non-stick works great. Only use plastic utensils when cooking to avoid scratching the surface. Also, be sure to use plastic scrubbers or sponges so the non-stick lasts. The square pan did warp some after just a couple of uses but it’s still okay for me. I’ve had these for almost a year now and they are easy to clean and have held up.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Deans

customer_reviews.title: I Love them
customer_reviews.text: Ok i had bought a cheap pot set for like half the price at walmart and after a year they just fell apart and broke but no longer non stick and i still continued too use them... i wanted to fix up my kitchen so i ws like let me look on amazon... i love these my other pans were never this great even from the start ....i cant even explain how easy they are to clean .... i just got them and made a steak and it came out wonderful....shipping was so fast it came in like 3 days or 2 maybe ...love them there a keeper and if your looking for some good pots buy,buy,buy
customer_reviews.author: EboneyNicole

customer_reviews.title: Great set for home chef or first apartment!
customer_reviews.text: I use these pots and pans daily. I'm not very gentle when it comes to storing them in my cabinets, but they are holding up well with no scratches whatsoever. Nonstick surface makes both cooking and cleaning a breeze. Any leftover residue in the pan after cooking comes off easily with warm water and a soft sponge. Great heat distribution and a nice weight on the bottom of the pan, so the handle doesn't cause the pan to tilt while it's sitting on the stovetop. Packaging was perfect, delivery was quick, no issues at all. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Dudley

customer_reviews.title: Not a complete practical set
customer_reviews.text: The pour spouts are annoying when you’re trying to cook rice. Had to buy a separate sauce pan for that (I don’t like rice makers). And the sauté pan is giant, had to buy an 8” pan separately since not everything I cook requires 14” of pan or whatever size it is. Great quality though.. just not a complete practical set.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: I love this set! More than I thought I would
customer_reviews.text: I was honestly worried about buying this set, thought I was liking the price way more than the quality. Boy was I wrong. My stove is gas, open flame. I've been using this set non-stop for a month and there has been: no chipping, no melted or flaking non-stick, no chips, no scuffs, no scratches, no blackening of the bottoms, no rust. Heats nice and evenly. Can get them really hot and it doesn't affect the pan. And I clean them almost exclusively by throwing them in the dishwasher. Don't listen to those crazy bad reviews, you want this set.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Rentz

customer_reviews.title: Fine, not great - warranty misleading
customer_reviews.text: Fine, normal set. I’ve had for 3 years and now all of the non stick coating is warping and beginning to peel off. “Lifetime warranty” doesn’t cover anything other than manufacturers defect.
customer_reviews.author: M B

customer_reviews.title: Durability in question
customer_reviews.text: I have used T-fal saucepans before and they were durable but i was greatly dissatisfied with this set. I haven't used it for three months and already the bottom is scraping. This is very worrying.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT value but ... fell apart
customer_reviews.text: I bought this less than a year ago foie my new induction cooktop. The finish has coming off the rims -- okay -- but the bottom plate that has fallen off the small skillet. Ergo, it won't work. I don't know about you, but I expect more than one year of service from pots and pans.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Reader

customer_reviews.title: They worked well for the first few months and are very easy to cook on though
customer_reviews.text: After owning these for about 8 months, the tephlon started peeling on many of the pots and pans and we had to throw them away. They worked well for the first few months and are very easy to cook on though. Definitely not a good investment though
customer_reviews.author: anabel

customer_reviews.title: Best non-stick I've ever had!
customer_reviews.text: Best nonstick I've ever used. I made a caramel apple dip type thing in it the other day, and then let it sit and dry overnight (oops). In the morning it still washed off like a dream, no soaking! Just be careful to keep to the recommended temps (no high-heat traditional stir-fry dishes) because it will ruin the non-stick and also potentially cause harm to you and anyone else breathing in the fumes. Obviously I know better, so that's never happened with me, and I love these pans!! Even better than the Calphalon set I've borrowed from roommates!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Z

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!/See update
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas and now the outside of the pans are peeling. This is only after 6 months. Update: Company is replacing damaged pots and pan. They are admitting any default. Goodwill gesture.
customer_reviews.author: teresa l freeman

customer_reviews.title: Very worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these about 6 months before writing the review to be sure I used it as said to write and honest review. The pots are as said “ non stick”. They clean very easy and the rubber handles are awesome. They are almost prefect. After washing. They get a white residue on the bottoms. I’ve changed soaps and done cold instead of hot. Even tired washing with non soap “cleanser”. Besides that, the pots are great.
customer_reviews.author: Lawreen J Charlery

customer_reviews.title: They cook and stack well
customer_reviews.text: The bottoms scratch even with the lightest use. The pots and pans cook well and fit great in one cabinet. The space saving is the reason I purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: richard

customer_reviews.title: Guests Love These
customer_reviews.text: We replaced all the cookware in our 12 cottages and the guests love the new cookware. Pans are solid. Color is great. Teflon is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Ruann Wood-Larson

customer_reviews.title: Returned as soon as they arrived.
customer_reviews.text: I returned these as soon as I saw them. Light weight. Cheap looking. I opted for a better set. They just look like they will not hold up. I would not recommend this set. Much better options out there.
customer_reviews.author: Beezly911

customer_reviews.title: Good pans for cheap price.
customer_reviews.text: Good pans however the bottom of one of the frying pans has begun to flake and not last well. Only had for a few weeks so far and quite disappointed that it hasn’t held up atleast on the bottom side. However super easy to clean. Everything washes right out! Recommend hand washing them only!
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Miller

customer_reviews.title: A good quality product
customer_reviews.text: It is compact and cooks very well. Light enough not to tire your wrists:) but i do not use it for oven. Stove only. Most importantly, takes min space as possible:) love it
customer_reviews.author: Name ince

customer_reviews.title: A complete cooking set..!!!
customer_reviews.text: Food cooks great and doesn't stick. No scratches were on my set, in perfect condition. If there were scratches as the other reviewer said, I would have returned it for another set but that doesn't effect the actual quality of the item & should not be used as a basis for not purchasing. I don't foresee this being a forever set, but it should last a good deal of time if you use the proper tools.
customer_reviews.author: loklok104

customer_reviews.title: ... these for about a week now and I absolutely love them! I haven't had anything stick to them ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for about a week now and I absolutely love them! I haven't had anything stick to them yet and the coating hasn't scratched at all! The red dot is helpful when wanting the right temperature. They are very sturdy, even the lids are sturdy. I like that the lids are compatible with the skillets and the pots it helps free up some much needed space in the cabinet. I have been washing them off almost immediately after use instead of using dishwasher in order to maintain the nice coating, and everything literally rinses off almost don't even need soap. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Aqua Zednik

customer_reviews.title: Awesome...but
customer_reviews.text: This pots are awesome. Nonsticking Great heat balance. Best purchase. I need to buy another one. So hard to find good pots. However, the tops are real glass. I had the set 2 weeks and one of the tops fell out of my cabinet and crashed into 100 pieces. I was devastated!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: T-Fal non stick cookware
customer_reviews.text: We love our T-Fal non stick dishes. They were shipped so nicely and came the next day. They are light weight and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: WM-AB

customer_reviews.title: Good bargain pan set
customer_reviews.text: I had a set of these for YEARS until I moved and decided to buy a new set. These work really well and super easy to clean. I usually clean by hand, but run them through the dish washer on occasion and they turn out fine.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Poor induction stovetop capability; good nonstick pans otherwise.
customer_reviews.text: No stick with regular use. Heat distribution is good, however the iron component is insufficient for a standard IKEA induction stovetop: the smallest frying pan doesn’t register as induction at all, and is thus useless. The other pans don’t have enough iron to register on the large burners, thus can only be used on small burners. Addendum: the induction burners recognize the pots, but insufficiently to heat on the maximal setting.
customer_reviews.author: Rasputin

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal Pans
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality. They cook evenly, are super easy to clean, and dont tend to scratch very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany M.

product_meta.title: T-fal Signature Nonstick Dishwasher Safe Cookware Set, 12-Piece, Black
product_meta.description: Size:12-Piece| Style Name:NonstickT fal C530SC Signature Nonstick Expert Thermo Spot Heat Indicator Dishwasher Safe Cookware Set, 12 Piece, Black. Created with the home chef in mind, T fal Signature nonstick cookware provides an array of user friendly features. Its innovative T fal Thermo Spot heat indicator makes it easy to properly pre heat pans, which helps seal in the flavor of food, whether sautéing or searing. When the pattern in the center turns to a solid red spot, the pan is hot and ready to cook. The cookware’s heavy gauge aluminum construction heats quickly and offers long lasting strength, while its even heat base distributes heat throughout for reliable cooking results. Use the cookware on any cook top, except for induction. Recyclable and PFOA , Lead , and Cadmium free, the cookware’s durable nonstick surfaces—inside and out—offer effortless food release (little to no fat needed), quick and easy cleaning, and a healthier choice when it comes to cookware. The cookware’s vented tempered glass lids trap in heat and moisture, while its ergonomically designed heat resistant handles offer a secure, comfortable grip and have end holes for optional hanging storage. Oven safe up to 350 degrees F and dishwasher safe, the 12 piece T fal Signature nonstick cookware set includes 7.75 inch and 11 inch fry pans, 1 quart and 2 quart sauce pans with lids, a 5.5 quart dutch oven with lid, a 10.25 inch griddle, and a spoon, ladle, and slotted spatula. Keywords; pot and pan set, cookware sets on sale, cooking pot, cookware sets, ollas de cocina, kitchenware, cooking pots, non toxic cookware, kitchenpots.
feature_bullets: Set includes: 7.75 inch and 11 inch fry pans, 1 quart and 2 quart sauce pans with lids, a 5.5 quart dutch oven with lid, a 10.25 inch griddle, and a spoon, ladle, and slotted spatula
Dishwasher safe: Easy to clean and dishwasher safe cookware set; Nonstick interior and exterior for low fat cooking and easy cleaning

Use and care: Safe for all cooking methods except induction; PFOA, Lead, and Cadmium free.Wash the frying pan in hot water and washing-up liquid to remove any dust. Dry it and rub a little cooking oil into the non-stick coating before using for the first time
Heats evenly: With our thermo spot indicator, know when our T fal pan is ready for use; Oven safe upto 350 Fahrenheit
Ergonomic heat resistant handles for a comfortable grip; Vented tempered glass lids trap in heat and moisture
